column5: A buddy and I made it out yesterday he caught a 24" & lost 2, I caught 6 between 18" & 22" & lost 1, between us we had 20+ follows to the boat but wouldn't commit, I also got a 6 & 5 lb lmbass & 4 & 2.5lb smbass, had the cameras but pike were to small & not into pictures of OOS fish Richard PS: Patiently waiting for my daughter to have our 2nd grandchild dew date yesterday, so I can plan my next fishing trip
